analysis.description:
CrryptoArena.attack (/unique_chucks/4/0x77c9acc811e4cf4b51dc3a3e05dc5d62fa887767.sol#275-308) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- players[_defAddress].virusDef == 0

Reentrancy in CrryptoArena.attack (/unique_chucks/4/0x77c9acc811e4cf4b51dc3a3e05dc5d62fa887767.sol#275-308):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(validateAttack(msg.sender,_defAddress) == true) (/unique_chucks/4/0x77c9acc811e4cf4b51dc3a3e05dc5d62fa887767.sol#279)
	- Factory.subPrograms(msg.sender,_programs) (/unique_chucks/4/0x77c9acc811e4cf4b51dc3a3e05dc5d62fa887767.sol#281-283)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- players (/unique_chucks/4/0x77c9acc811e4cf4b51dc3a3e05dc5d62fa887767.sol#283-285)

Reentrancy in CrryptoArena.attack (/unique_chucks/4/0x77c9acc811e4cf4b51dc3a3e05dc5d62fa887767.sol#275-308):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(validateAttack(msg.sender,_defAddress) == true) (/unique_chucks/4/0x77c9acc811e4cf4b51dc3a3e05dc5d62fa887767.sol#279)
	- Factory.subPrograms(msg.sender,_programs) (/unique_chucks/4/0x77c9acc811e4cf4b51dc3a3e05dc5d62fa887767.sol#281-283)
	- Engineer.subVirus(msg.sender,_virus) (/unique_chucks/4/0x77c9acc811e4cf4b51dc3a3e05dc5d62fa887767.sol#291)
	- programsValue = Factory.getProgramsValue() (/unique_chucks/4/0x77c9acc811e4cf4b51dc3a3e05dc5d62fa887767.sol#291)
	- (victory,atk,def,virusAtkDead,virusDefDead) = firstAttack(_defAddress,SafeMath.mul(_virus,VIRUS_MINING_PERIOD),_programs,programsValue) (/unique_chucks/4/0x77c9acc811e4cf4b51dc3a3e05dc5d62fa887767.sol#293-296)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- players (/unique_chucks/4/0x77c9acc811e4cf4b51dc3a3e05dc5d62fa887767.sol#293-296)

Reentrancy in CrryptoArena.attack (/unique_chucks/4/0x77c9acc811e4cf4b51dc3a3e05dc5d62fa887767.sol#275-308):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(validateAttack(msg.sender,_defAddress) == true) (/unique_chucks/4/0x77c9acc811e4cf4b51dc3a3e05dc5d62fa887767.sol#279)
	- Factory.subPrograms(msg.sender,_programs) (/unique_chucks/4/0x77c9acc811e4cf4b51dc3a3e05dc5d62fa887767.sol#281-283)
	- Engineer.subVirus(msg.sender,_virus) (/unique_chucks/4/0x77c9acc811e4cf4b51dc3a3e05dc5d62fa887767.sol#291)
	- programsValue = Factory.getProgramsValue() (/unique_chucks/4/0x77c9acc811e4cf4b51dc3a3e05dc5d62fa887767.sol#291)
	- (victory,atk,def,virusAtkDead,virusDefDead) = firstAttack(_defAddress,SafeMath.mul(_virus,VIRUS_MINING_PERIOD),_programs,programsValue) (/unique_chucks/4/0x77c9acc811e4cf4b51dc3a3e05dc5d62fa887767.sol#293-296)
	- endAttack(_defAddress,victory,SafeMath.div(virusAtkDead,VIRUS_MINING_PERIOD),SafeMath.div(virusDefDead,VIRUS_MINING_PERIOD),atk,def,1,_programs) (/unique_chucks/4/0x77c9acc811e4cf4b51dc3a3e05dc5d62fa887767.sol#296-298)
	- againAttack(_defAddress,SafeMath.div(SafeMath.mul(SafeMath.mul(_virus,VIRUS_MINING_PERIOD),programsValue[1]),100)) (/unique_chucks/4/0x77c9acc811e4cf4b51dc3a3e05dc5d62fa887767.sol#298-304)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- players (/unique_chucks/4/0x77c9acc811e4cf4b51dc3a3e05dc5d62fa887767.sol#298-304)
programs in CrryptoArena.againAttack (/unique_chucks/4/0x77c9acc811e4cf4b51dc3a3e05dc5d62fa887767.sol#362) is a local variable never initialiazed
